title: Python Overtook French in Schools
shortDescription: In 2015, Python became more popular than French as a language taught in primary schools!
detailedDescription: According to a 2015 survey by Ocado Technology, Python surpassed French in popularity for primary school teaching. The survey of 3,000 respondents found that 6 out of 10 parents preferred their children to learn Python over French. This shows how programming languages are becoming as important as traditional foreign languages in education.
